description: Most people love summer -- hockey fans know otherwise. The time between June and October is bleak. But now Alexa can help you count the days until hockey returns.
exampleInteractions: Alexa ask Hockey Countdown how many days are left
Alexa ask Hockey Countdown for the countdown
Alexa tell Hockey Countdown to give me the days left
name: Hockey Countdown
shortDescription: Count the days until the 16-17 NHL hockey season. Ask "how many days are left?" and Alexa will help you pass the time!
